text: Maesteg Community Hospital () is a community hospital in Maesteg, Wales. It is managed by Cwm Taf Morgannwg University Health Board. ==History== The hospital has its origins in a temporary facility established for injured servicemen in 1914. The current hospital, which was designed by Mr J Humphreys as a permanent facility and built by Mr Tom Thomas, opened later in the war. It subsequently became a maternity hospital and joined the National Health Service as Maesteg General Hospital in 1948. ==References== Category:NHS hospitals in Wales Category:Hospitals in Bridgend County Borough Category:Hospitals established in 1914 Category:Cwm Taf Morgannwg University Health Board
title: Maesteg Community Hospital
